titleStmt.title: Severall poysonous and sedicious papers of Mr. David Jenkins ansvvered. By H.P. barrester of Lincolnes Inne.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.
Jenkins, David, 1582-1663. Vindication of Judge Jenkins prisoner in the Tower, the 29. of Aprill, 1647.
Jenkins, David, 1582-1663. Cordiall of Judge Jenkins, for the good people of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock dwelling in Pauls Church yard, at the signe of the Kings Head.,

notesStmt.note: Includes "The vindication of Judge Jenkins prisoner in the Tower, the 29. of Aprill, 1647" (Wing J613), and "The reply of Judge Jenkins to Mr. H.P.", a reprinting of "The cordiall of Judge Jenkins, for the good people of London" (Wing J586).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "arker" inserted after H.P.; "June 19".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church yard, at the signe of the Kings Head.
